reviews.review:
Long are gone the days where you could jump into a server and wage 16 vs 16 battles on de_dust on cs 1.5,  this game has been shrunk into a tournament-esque 5v5 framework,  feels very empty, the combat much more personal and has an unwarranted micro transactional annoyance attached to it.  They really listened to the feedback of the people the least had to be listened to.   
-The fun and enjoyable "VIP" mode is no longer available.
-A lot of the classic maps haven't made a comeback.
-Obtaining ranks isn't appealing and serves as a tool and means for players to harass each other.
-The voice acting is too simple and flavorless.
